title: Tin Foil Hat Ep 9: Crack Money With Dayvid Figler
description: Thank you for tuning into another fun episode of Tin Foil Hat with Sam Tripoli.  On this episode I interview slam poet superstar and defense attorney Dayvid Figler about the infamous Vegas DA's "Pay for Witness Testimony" scandal that rock the legal system in Sin City.  This interview was incredible to do and I hope you enjoy listening! Please rate and review on iTunes and help spread the word about Tin Foil Hat!
